author: Anand Sinha
title: Michael Saylor's biggest U-turn yet, 'You don't need Bitcoin'
description: Bitcoin maximalist Michael Saylor seems to be making a dramatic U-turn.
content:
Michael Saylor's biggest U-turn yet, 'You don't need Bitcoin' originally appeared on TheStreet.
Michael Saylor, who is arguably the most ferocious Bitcoin advocate in the corporate circles, recently… [+2121 chars]
